name: Saarathi Anglo-Assamese Medical Dictionary
description: The First Offline Anglo-Assamese Medical Dictionary App. The App is developed by Anil Baruah on behalf of Assamese Language and Software Development Centre. The App Contains 4 Features like 2 Nos. of Anglo-Assamese Medical Dictionaries, English-Assamese Dictionary and Scientific Name. The medical dictionary features are digital version of already published books edited by renown doctors. Scientific Name and English-Assamese features are digital conversion of the published books by Anil Baruah. It provides English definitions, Word Pronunciation and Assamese definitions of the word with Fast and easy searching facility. There is auto suggestion available in this Dictionary, so you need not type full words.  Our dictionary works in OFFLINE mode. No internet connection is required after the app download. So you can carry this dictionary with you everywhere in your cellphone for use when you have no net connection. Main Features :  1. Anglo-Assamese Medical Dictionary by Dr Bikaas Barooah. 2. Anglo-Assamese Medical Dictionary by Dr Lohit Kr. Borah 3. Modern English-Assamese Dictionary by Anil Baruah 4. Assamese-English Scientific Name by Anil Baruah
